name: Guardian of the forest (Benni_Tr)
description:
In this little game you complete tasks for the forest spirits so that the new godtree can grow through its first phases.

It's a simple quest game where you can take a leisurely look at the forest and experience the funny characteristics of the Npcs.

The controls are simple:

Gamepad:

Interact with south button

Move with left stick

Look around with right sick

Keyboard and mouse:

Interact with e

Move with w,a,s,d

Look around with mouse

- spetial thanks to: Jasmin, Darwin, Paul and all my teachers for helping me with my project!-
